Prerequisite: Con 15, any primal class, proficiency with hide armor

Benefit: While wearing hide armor, you can gain a +2 bonus to AC instead of using your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier to determine your AC.

Update (2/8/2010)

Replace the feat's Benefit entry with the following text: "While wearing hide armor, you can gain a +2 bonus to AC instead of using your Dexterity or Intelligence modifier to determine your AC."

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 137.
